languages.text:
"Последний шепот увертюры стих,
Пора, Купец Бездомный, совершить
Паломничество на подмостки сцены.
Прощальный дар мой — скромный реквизит".
{n}Неизвестный вкладывает что-то в вашу ладонь и растворяется в сумраке.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Последний шепот увертюры стих,
Пора, Купец Бездомный, совершить
Паломничество на подмостки сцены.
Прощальный дар мой — скромный реквизит".
{n}Неизвестный вкладывает что-то в вашу ладонь и растворяется в сумраке.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:
The Merchant's time to tread the boards has come,
Embark you now upon your pilgrimage.
And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

languages.text:
“诗的序曲，最后一幕。
商人即在舞台上停驻。
时辰已到，请踏上你的朝圣之路。
收下这件物品，作为临别的礼物。”
{n}陌生人将一件物品放在了你手里，之后消失在了暮色之中。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:
The Merchant's time to tread the boards has come,
Embark you now upon your pilgrimage.
And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
“诗的序曲，最后一幕。
商人即在舞台上停驻。
时辰已到，请踏上你的朝圣之路。
收下这件物品，作为临别的礼物。”
{n}陌生人将一件物品放在了你手里，之后消失在了暮色之中。{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
「この詩の序曲、最後の一節を聞きたまえ。
商人よ、演じる時が来た
さあ、巡礼の旅に出よう。
餞別として、ささやかな小道具を授ける」
{n}見知らぬ人物は手に何かを握らせて、黄昏の中に消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:
The Merchant's time to tread the boards has come,
Embark you now upon your pilgrimage.
And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

{n}見知らぬ人物は手に何かを握らせて、黄昏の中に消えていった。{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
«La obertura termina con estos versos:
{mf|el|la} Mercader debe ahora recorrer su camino,
partir en su propio viaje cual peregrino.
Este es mi regalo de despedida: un humilde atrezo».
{n}El desconocido te deja algo en la mano y desaparece en el crepúsculo.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:
The Merchant's time to tread the boards has come,
Embark you now upon your pilgrimage.
And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

{mf|el|la} Mercader debe ahora recorrer su camino,

{n}El desconocido te deja algo en la mano y desaparece en el crepúsculo.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
« Pour conclure cette ouverture, quelques derniers vers :
C'est au tour {mf|du Marchand|de la Marchande} d'entrer en scène,
D'effectuer son pèlerinage quoi qu'il advienne.
Voici un modeste présent, en espérant qu'il saura vous satisfaire. »
{n}L'étranger dépose quelque chose entre vos mains et disparaît dans la pénombre.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:
The Merchant's time to tread the boards has come,
Embark you now upon your pilgrimage.
And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

{n}L'étranger dépose quelque chose entre vos mains et disparaît dans la pénombre.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Hier die letzten Zeilen der Ouvertüre:
Der Händler muss nun die Bühne betreten,
seine Pilgerfahrt antreten
und nehmen mein Abschiedsgeschenk: ein bescheidenes Requisit."
{n}Der Fremde legt dir etwas in die Hand und verschwindet im Zwielicht.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:

And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

languages.text:
"Manzum uvertürümüzün son satırları:
Tüccar'ın sahneye çıkma vakti,
Seni bekliyor hac yolculuğu.
Bu da veda armağanım, mütevazı bir yardım."
{n}Yabancı, eline bir şey tutuşturuyor ve alaca karanlığa doğru kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"This overture in verse, the final lines:
The Merchant's time to tread the boards has come,
Embark you now upon your pilgrimage.
And take my parting gift: a humble prop."
{n}The stranger deposits something in your hand and disappears into the twilight.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Uvertür manzum yazılmış, son satırlar:
Tüccarın sahneye çıkma vakti,
Seni bekliyor hac yolculuğu.
Ve veda armağanım, mütevazı bir yardım."
{n}Yabancı, eline bir şey tutuşturuyor ve alaca karanlığa doğru gidip kayboluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
